code: @Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     JndiRegistry registry = super.createRegistry().     meterRegistry = new CompositeMeterRegistry().     meterRegistry.add(new SimpleMeterRegistry()).     meterRegistry.add(new JmxMeterRegistry(CamelJmxConfig.DEFAULT, Clock.SYSTEM, HierarchicalNameMapper.DEFAULT)).     registry.bind(MicrometerConstants.METRICS_REGISTRY_NAME, meterRegistry).     return registry. }

@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     MicrometerRoutePolicyFactory factory = new MicrometerRoutePolicyFactory().     factory.setMeterRegistry(meterRegistry).     context.addRoutePolicyFactory(factory).     return context. }
